Body.Content:
We are announcing new Excel actions in Power Automate for desktop. Starting on July 23, 2024, the actions pane will include the following dedicated Excel actions:
  • Copy Excel worksheet
  • Read formula from Excel
  • Get table range from Excel worksheet
  • Auto fill cells in Excel worksheet
  • Append cells in Excel worksheet
  • Lookup range in Excel worksheet
  • Set color of cells in Excel worksheet
How does this affect me?
These actions provide new capabilities empowering makers to enhance their desktop flows involving Excel.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Automate â€“ New Excel actions in Power Automate for desktop announcement
